title: Ferreteria
content:
Hello.  
Here's another font in development. Is called "ferretería" (hardware store?) and will be available soon in latinotype.

cheking the first version, I realized that some of the details can improve.

old (vieja) new (nueva)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816090649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ferreteria-old-new-12-08_6398.jpg)

Some cuts could be more pronounced

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816090649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ferret-3-gliphs_3953.jpg)

and some comparisons

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816090649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/frret-sample_3704.jpg)
author: jko
